sentences.en: And his disciples asked him, saying, What might this parable be?
sentences.cn: 9门徒问耶稣说, 这比喻是什么意思 呢 .

sentences.en: And His disciples questioned Him as to what this parable might be.
Another said: I bet that is also a parable.
sentences.cn: 某乙说: 我打赌这话也是个譬喻.

sentences.en: I see that I have lapsed into parable and ecstatic declamation.
sentences.cn: 我知道我在比喻和狂喜的辩论中造成了遗误.

sentences.en: Mt . 13:18 You therefore hear the parable of the one who sowed.
sentences.cn: 太十三18所以你们要听这撒种者的比喻.

sentences.en: Now the parable is this: The seed is the word of God.
sentences.cn: 这比喻乃是这样.种子就是神的道.

sentences.en: One day Truth beheld Parable attired in colorful, expensive garments.
sentences.cn: 一天,真理看到了穿着色彩亮丽, 价格昂贵外衣的寓言.

sentences.en: Peter said to Him, " Explain the parable to us. "
sentences.cn: 太 15:15 彼得对耶稣说 、 请将这比喻讲给我们听.

sentences.en: The first said: No, in reality: in parable you have lost.
sentences.cn: 甲说: 非也, 赢在现实; 在譬喻中你输了.

sentences.en: The minister preached a sermon on the parable of the lost sheep.
sentences.cn: 牧师讲道时用了亡羊的比喻.

sentences.en: The parable of the good Samaritan just like it.
sentences.cn: 好撒玛利亚人的比喻正是如此.

sentences.en: The story is a pleasing parable of the problems created by an excess of wealth.
sentences.cn: 这是个令人开怀的寓言，讲的是财富过剩造成的问题。

sentences.en: Then answered Peter and said unto him, Declare unto us this parable.
sentences.cn: 彼得对耶稣说 、 请将这比喻讲给我们听.

sentences.en: This parable is accountability for service, not about our security in Christ.
sentences.cn: 这个比喻的用意是要指出,我们要用恩赐忠心服侍, 而非谈论是否失去救恩.

words.tran_cn: 抛物线的；比喻的；寓言的
寓言，比喻；隐晦或谜般的格言

trans.tran_en: a short simple story that teaches a moral or religious lesson, especially one of the stories told by Jesus in the Bible
